name: LAUGH
description:
Use the number keys 1 - 2 - 3 - 4 ESC to restart

Right Click screen and choose "GO FULLSCREEN" for best experience

Please consider donating to support my interactive strange art. Thank you.

Made for the art show ACT NOW curated by Brian Ulbrichsen- it was shown in Copenhagen Denmark from October 5th - 17th 2015 https://www.facebook.com/events/655282824608327/

Beethoven cover song by HertzDevil https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-gdIjKd7Ic
